featureRequests.title: Spanish localization
featureRequests.description: Add Spanish language support for LessonCraft

featureRequests.title: Offline mode
featureRequests.description: Allow teachers to use app without internet

featureRequests.title: API endpoint development
featureRequests.description: Build V5 API endpoints for mobile apps

featureRequests.title: Add Protestant faith app
featureRequests.description: Add Protestant denomination to Gospel Tuned lineup

featureRequests.title: Missionary version of LessonCraft
featureRequests.description: Build a missionary-focused version of LessonCraft for LDS missionaries

featureRequests.title: Personal Fireside UI
featureRequests.description: Build dedicated UI for browsing and playing Personal Fireside episodes in the app
featureRequests.notes: Firesides now accessible via Study tab and Be Inspired view

featureRequests.title: Daily Devotional UI (Morning Light)
featureRequests.description: Build dedicated UI for daily devotionals with calendar view and audio player
featureRequests.notes: Morning Light banner on Home screen + archive in Be Inspired view

featureRequests.title: In-App Art Gallery Browser
featureRequests.description: Browse AI Tuned artwork by topic, add to lessons. ArtworkBrowserView.swift
featureRequests.notes: Gospel Art Gallery section added to Home screen — commit 83a9b0b

featureRequests.title: LessonCraft Media Dashboard
featureRequests.description: Web dashboard on command center showing all R2 media assets, play audio, view images, completion status

featureRequests.title: Cover images for all content cards
featureRequests.description: Generate beautiful LDS devotional art for each CFM week, Easter episode, Fireside, and Morning Light card.
featureRequests.notes: 52 CFM covers + 8 new fireside art uploaded to R2. All wired into catalog.

featureRequests.title: Content standing approval — build freely via catalog API
featureRequests.description: Jeff approved blanket content production as long as it goes through R2 + Cloudflare Workers catalog system.

featureRequests.title: Easter artwork — v3 LDS devotional style locked in
featureRequests.description: Approved style: soft diffused light, muted palette, approachable Christ, no halos/crosses/baroque. Generator: Gemini.

featureRequests.title: Share Card feature
featureRequests.description: ShareCardRenderer renders 1080x1350px share images. Share button in episode player toolbar.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 4687441

featureRequests.title: Web Preview /daily/{id} pages
featureRequests.description: Cloudflare Worker serving /daily/{episodeId} pages with OG/Twitter meta tags, artwork hero, audio player, App Store button.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed to api.aituned.io. Share URL now uses aituned.io/listen/{id}.

featureRequests.title: Intent-driven Home screen redesign
featureRequests.description: New Home screen: time-of-day greeting, Morning Light banner, intent cards, Continue Listening, This Week's Study.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 9f7cdb4. Jeff approved the design.

featureRequests.title: Artwork similarity audit
featureRequests.description: Pull all R2 images, compare pairs visually. Flag duplicates/too-similar.
featureRequests.notes: Gallery at 120 pieces with improved diversity across 9 collections.

featureRequests.title: Voice re-generation with new roster
featureRequests.description: Re-generate all existing audio with locked-in voice roster.
featureRequests.notes: 267 files re-generated, 0 failures. All voices now correct.

featureRequests.title: lessoncraft.app domain routing for deep links
featureRequests.description: Set up lessoncraft.app DNS for deep links and Apple Universal Links.
featureRequests.notes: lessoncraft.app belongs to EcomTrackify — NOT our domain! Share URLs now use aituned.io/listen/{id} instead.

featureRequests.title: Read-along narration text in documentary segments
featureRequests.description: Add synchronized text display during audio playback for documentary episodes
featureRequests.notes: Commit 85f0c00

featureRequests.title: CFM Teaching Coach Enhancement
featureRequests.description: After Jared's closing, add CTA for 'How to Teach This Week's Lesson'. Warm close with varied encouragement.
featureRequests.notes: Jeff approved. Sample generated for Week 7 (commit d9c7a0b). Full 52-week rollout pending.

featureRequests.title: JD Art Gallery — in-app browser + print ordering
featureRequests.description: Jacque Dubois Fine Art Gallery inside LessonCraft. Browse by collection, set wallpapers, order prints via Printful.
featureRequests.notes: Commits 36c69f2 + bae4890. 120 pieces on R2.

featureRequests.title: Printful print-on-demand integration
featureRequests.description: White-label print store via Printful. 14 products created with 4 size variants each.
featureRequests.notes: Printful account live. Print Store UI fully built with 7 product types. Stripe webhook Worker deployed (89f7890c). Still needs: wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET.

featureRequests.title: Subscription system (StoreKit 2)
featureRequests.description: 3 tiers: $4.99/mo, $39.99/yr, $1.99/mo student. PaywallView + SubscriptionManager.
featureRequests.notes: isDemoMode=true for beta.

featureRequests.title: Stripe webhook for Cloudflare Worker
featureRequests.description: Stripe checkout.session.completed webhook handler in aituned-api Worker.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed as worker version 89f7890c. Printful token bug fixed (standardized to PRINTFUL_API_TOKEN).

featureRequests.title: jacquedubois.art gallery website
featureRequests.description: Dark gallery website for J. Dubois art. Filterable by collection, lightbox modal, print ordering.
featureRequests.notes: Rebuilt Feb 12 with all 133 real artworks. LDS art separated to /lds path. CDN cache battle resolved.

featureRequests.title: Episode description expandable + shareable
featureRequests.description: Episode descriptions now expandable and shareable in the app UI.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 5ab25ff

featureRequests.title: CFM episodes use dedicated R2 cover art
featureRequests.description: CFM episodes pull dedicated period-correct cover art from R2.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 310ddf4

featureRequests.title: Morning Light calendar strip
featureRequests.description: Horizontal week view (Sun-Sat) with artwork thumbnails per day, today auto-scrolled with gold ring, tap to play.
featureRequests.notes: MorningLightCalendarStrip.swift — commit bc8b2d9

featureRequests.title: Easter calendar strip with notifications
featureRequests.description: Maps 15 episodes to real dates (Mar 24–Apr 8). Auto-scroll to today, artwork thumbnails. Local notifications at 7:30 AM each day.
featureRequests.notes: EasterCalendarStrip.swift — commit 6987a85

featureRequests.title: Image-backed intent cards on HomeView
featureRequests.description: New ImageIntentCard component replaces flat gradient SquareIntentCard. All 4 HomeView cards now image-backed.
featureRequests.notes: Commits 86d4539, 4e34b47

featureRequests.title: Study tab redesign
featureRequests.description: Morning Light at top, compact CFM horizontal scroll, Easter timeline, Firesides list. Less image-heavy.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 88d4061

featureRequests.title: Multi-product print store upgrade
featureRequests.description: 7 product types (canvas wrap, framed canvas, framed poster, framed poster w/ mat, metal print, poster w/ hanger, rolled poster). Frame color picker with visual swatches. Product-aware size/price matrix.
featureRequests.notes: Commit f6b711d. iOS build verified.

featureRequests.title: Gallery category browser with filter chips
featureRequests.description: JDGalleryView with 9 category filter chips (All, Jesus Christ, Art Nouveau, Sacred, etc.). Each chip has icon + title + count badge.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 227275d. 133-artwork catalog uploaded to R2 REMOTE.

featureRequests.title: Universal share for all episode types
featureRequests.description: Full text + smart link sharing for ALL episode types, not just Morning Light.
featureRequests.notes: Commit 1cf445e. Share URL: aituned.io/listen/{id}

featureRequests.title: In-app Privacy Policy + Terms of Service
featureRequests.description: Native in-app Privacy Policy and Terms of Service screens. Required for App Store submission.
featureRequests.notes: Commit f88eea6

featureRequests.title: HVAC Research skill for FieldLearner content
featureRequests.description: Content scraping toolkit: blog scraper, topic classifier, YouTube indexer, search aggregator. 77 articles + 30 videos + 245 sources.
featureRequests.notes: Skill at ~/Jackbot/skills/hvac-research/. Content shared with JCI bot.

featureRequests.title: aituned.io B2B enterprise rewrite
featureRequests.description: Rewrote aituned.io as B2B enterprise AI platform. 6 industries. Removed all faith-based content.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed to Cloudflare Pages.

featureRequests.title: TikTok account + content strategy
featureRequests.description: TikTok account created for Gospel Tuned brand. Strategy: 2-3x/day art reveals, scripture cards, Morning Light clips.
featureRequests.notes: Account created. Need TikTok handle from Jeff. Video pipeline build pending.

featureRequests.title: Print store orientation-aware previews + frame mockups
featureRequests.description: Jeff wants: orientation-aware previews, frame mockup around image, size selector showing actual image, frame color picker, product type selector.
featureRequests.notes: Wall preview now renders frame borders with selected frame color. Further polish needed.

featureRequests.title: LDS art separated from public gallery website
featureRequests.description: gallery.html: 79 public artworks. lds.html: 35 LDS-specific pieces at /lds path.
featureRequests.notes: Keeps gallery appropriate for all-faith audience.
